comment: MIT OpenCourseWare --could you please post the spring follow-up to this course? I found MIT 5.112 archived (Fall, circa2003), but it appears to be the same 1st semester course.
was that solid state thing supposed to be making fun of 3.091?
Ahaha no1 knows what a chelater is rofl XD
That is strange. We are surprised you didn't find the 2005 version. You can find that here at: http://ocw.mit.edu/5-112F05.

Thank you for your response. That is the 5.112 (Fall, circa2003) course I was referring to. Looking at lecture titles, and it is clearly the same class as 5.111 with the same lecture topics being discussed at the same points in the semester.
Also, thanks for posting some of the Graduate courses. The crystallography lectures look like fun
